name: Dinos Stole My Hyperdrive
description:
Dinos stole my hyperdrive!

A fast-paced shooter made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 38.

At it's current state, it is 98.5% not broken.

Enjoy!

  • Programmed by: Jeremy Alexander "@Jerementor"
  • Art and Animations by: Tibi Tircomnicu "@thetibith"
  • Additional Programming by: Jordan Karlsruher "@yorden"
  • SFX and Music by: XPRSMUSIC & Aaron Karlsruher
